Donald Rumsfeld quickly prodded military leaders on the subject. Michael Copps said, The Comcast-NBCU joint venture opens the door to the cable-ization of the open Internet. The potential for walled gardens, tollbooths, content prioritization, access fees... and a stake in the heart of independent content production is now very real. AP Pro Football Writer DALLAS( AP)- NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell is not concerned about Michael Vick being billed as hosting a Super Bowl party because the Eagles quarterback told him it's not true. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said.
